title: Dress Code
content: Students must adhere to the prescribed dress code and maintain a neat appearance. Uniforms should be worn on all school days and during official functions.

title: Examination Rules
content: During examinations, mobile phones and smart devices are strictly prohibited. Any form of malpractice will lead to disqualification.

title: Attendance Policy
content: Students must maintain a minimum of 75% attendance throughout the academic year to be eligible for board examinations.

title: Digital Learning Guidelines
content: Students must ensure a distraction-free environment during online classes. Assignments should be submitted on time through the designated platforms.

title: Code of Conduct
content: All students must follow the school's disciplinary policies, including respect for teachers, peers, and staff members.

title: Library Rules
content: Books must be returned within the due date. Silence must be maintained inside the library.

title: Sports and Extracurricular Activities
content: Participation in sports and extracurricular activities is encouraged. Students must follow fair play and team spirit at all times.

title: Use of School Property
content: Any damage to school property must be reported immediately. Students will be held accountable for intentional damage.

title: Health & Safety Guidelines
content: Students should maintain hygiene and follow health protocols. In case of sickness, a medical certificate is required for extended absences.

title: Parental Engagement
content: Parents should regularly check the school portal for updates on academic progress, attendance, and important notices.
